description.original: This plugin allows to force the view mode and editing mode for a note by using front matter
description.translation: This plugin allows to force the view mode and editing mode for a note by using front matter

.setDesc("切勿更改在特定视图模式下从另一个笔记打开的笔记的视图模式")
dict..setDesc(`Debounce timeout is the time i: .setDesc(`防抖超时是设置视图模式的时间（以毫秒为单位）。设置 “0” 以禁用防抖动 （默认值为 “300”）。如果您在使用插件时遇到问题，请尝试增加此值。`)
